nodes.text: The Government Cirlce was the government district within the walls of Worlport, the capital city of Ord Mantell.

Home to the central government of Ord Mantell, Government Circle was comprised of administrative office buildings and lavish residences for the political elite of the planet. Populated by government workers and legal aides, the streets of Government Circle were bustling with activity and a facade of bureaucracy. The center of the Circle was dominated by the towers of the Government House, the official residence of the Governor and their family. Not far from the towering structure was the Red House, the city's primary prison. Govermnet Circle was located at the terminus of the Path of Coins, which led directly to the main gate of Morro Spaceport at the hear of the city.
